Pyro:



Pyro went up a few feet, hitting the ground again.  His insides were 
messed up.  Luckily not only was he a pyromaniac, he was 
intelligent.  A plate covering down there had been added to his tank 
mode to keep unfortunate mishaps like that from happening, though he 
didn't have mobility.  

He transformed to robot mode, flame cannon in hand.  He fired off 
three fireballs at Rodimus Prime.
